results.title: Metaphor of belonging
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Sharon Huebner
results.brief_description: Metaphor of belonging explores an internal journey to search for an absent mother and find that connection in the storyteller’s own experience of motherhood.

results.title: Metamorphs: 1st year Swinburne Multimedia Design Project
results.brief_description:
A selection of animated morphs created by nine students in their first year Multimedia course, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology.
The students are: Alicia Braumberger, Andrew Coles, Matthew Robinson, Michael Yates, Oliver Pauliczek, Reif Campling, Richard Osellame, Steven Donnet and Yudy Chainy.
Includes a single split-screen edited trailer and a full version of each of the nine morphs created by the students.

results.title: Metamorphosis: TM
results.brief_description: A colour 2D computer animation in response to the project theme of metamorphosis. A visual poem that puns on the meaning of metamorphosis…time atomises this poem. (No credits available).

results.title: Metamorphosis: DW
results.brief_description: A colour 2D computer animation in response to the project theme of metamorphosis. The head of a rhinoceros appears and wings then sprout to fly him away. Animator uses both soundtrack and foley in this short animation.

results.title: Metamorphosis: BM
results.brief_description: A 2D hand-drawn animation that responds to the set theme of metamorphosis. Animator Ben McGill morphs his initials into Mr. Ogilvy, a snail and then to a dinosaur.

results.title: Metamorphosis of the cello
results.brief_description: When a sensitive and accomplished musician plays on such a beautiful instrument as this cello, there comes into being a creation of beauty - music whose power stirs our emotions. what causes this effect - the composer, performer or craftsman who made the instrument? This portrait if the cellist and the history of the cello itself corresponds with the different movements of the music played.

results.title: Metamorphosis
results.creator_credit: Texture Films, Tim Wallace and Catherine Mercier
results.brief_description: A young girl takes some caterpillars home to watch tem grow into chrysalises, laster she watches a butterfly emerge and then frees it. Non-narrated. Music by John Putnam.
